body_html: The behaviour is expected, but I agree that it'd be better to make it an internal method. It might still be worth documenting it, so that more advanced users are still guaranteed to have access to them. It'd be like _sparse_mask.
body_text: The behaviour is expected, but I agree that it'd be better to make it an internal method. It might still be worth documenting it, so that more advanced users are still guaranteed to have access to them. It'd be like _sparse_mask.
body: The behaviour is expected, but I agree that it'd be better to make it an internal method. It might still be worth documenting it, so that more advanced users are still guaranteed to have access to them. It'd be like `_sparse_mask`.
